=== Project Goals ===
The principal objective is to support devices which do not have hardware accelerated graphics and to bring to these devices the latest updates available in the Ubuntu world. Associated aims are to build a community around the release and for the release to be as 'light' as possible. 

It will be built using the Ubuntu infrastructure for creating a distribution.

=== Roadmap ===
<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Roadmaps/Lucid/Liquid|Lucid Roadmap]]</nowiki>

==== Nice to Have Features ====

* use nodm or gdm?

* Investigate using maximus instead of matchbox

* Try to make Liquid free desktop compliant

* Investigate using sheevaplug debian-installer from Martin Michlmayr journal http://www.cyrius.com/debian/kirkwood/sheevaplug/install.html
** Make it easy to install and update

* Run google gadgets?

* Run apps from:
** Android
** Maemo
** WebOS

* Create/Use a SDK to attract more developers. It would be nice to have a consistent,centralized,easy way for developers to create application for Ubuntu/Ubuntu Liquid 

* Investigate ways to reduce energy usage

* What more? What could be improved? What do you want Ubuntu Liquid to do for you?
